description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the information disclosure vulnerability in the Windows Remote Access Connection Manager (CVE-2024-30071), it is recommended to apply the latest security updates as specified in the KB articles.

1. Identify your Windows version and ensure you have the correct build number.

2. Download and install the following relevant updates:
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2: [KB5040442](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040442)
   - For Windows 11 Version 22H2: [KB5040442](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040442)
   - For Windows 11 Version 21H2: [KB5040431](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040431)
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2: [KB5040427](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040427)
   - For Windows 10 Version 21H2: [KB5040448](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040448)

3. Restart your system after applying updates to ensure changes are effective.

**Details**:
- The updates address vulnerabilities related to buffer over-read that could lead to unauthorized information exposure. Always ensure that updates are applied in a timely manner to maintain system security.
